book.title: Trail-Tales of Western Canada
book.description: 简介： Old Ken was down on his luck. For well-nigh fifty years he had gone the pace in a district where certain men say glibly, there's no God west of the Rockies. The old prospector had been, according to those who knew him best, in one of three conditions...
